Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ğd-ḥr with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed arms in relief holding a blue painted adze and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with blue painted Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar; the foot is damaged.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
